message: Hello Bob, I'm offering you a great product for a price of $14,000. I believe this product will be very valuable to you.
I appreciate your offer, but I'm looking to save even more money. I'm willing to pay $12,000 for the product. Can you meet me at this price?
Bob, I understand you're looking for a good deal.  While I value this product highly, I can come down to $13,000. This is my final offer.
I appreciate your willingness to negotiate, but I'm still looking to save more. I'm willing to pay $12,500 for the product. Can you meet me at this price?
